Card.Rules:
trigger = 2 def OnTriggered(a): global list c = me.stock.Top() if c: list = CardList() list.add(c) game.PeekCard(me, c, me.stock) d = me.stock.Top() if d: list.add(d) game.PeekCard(me, d, me.stock) game.PushEventResume(me, card, "OnPicked", list) game.PickCard(me, list, False, game.PICK_TYPE_HAND)
def OnPicked(c): c = list[0] if c: game.MoveCard(me, c, me.secret, me.hand, 1) d = list[1] if d: game.MoveCard(me, d, me.secret, me.stock, 0)

#PreventKO #Above comment prevents KO because it could save your life. keeper = 'true' trigger = 2 def OnKeeperDestroyed(c): game.PushHeal(me, 1)

trigger = 3 def OnTriggered(a): game.PushEventResume(me, card, 'OnResume') game.PushPlayCard(me, me.hand)
def OnResume(z): game.MoveCard(me, card, me.played, me.stock, 0) game.Shuffle(me.stock)

Card.FlavorTextEng: "Don't forget to go before we start our big invasion!" —Mole Man
Card.Rules: trigger = 2 def OnTriggered(a): atk = game.PushPlayCard(me, game.LegalHand(me).FilterByHeroes(['Mole Man','Moloid'])) atk.attackBonus = 2

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's level [2] or less, play it.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Best Moloid plan ever.

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put all Mole Man and Moloid cards you revealed into your hand. Put the rest back in any order. Then you may play a Mole Man or Moloid card.
<2:> Choose a player. That player discards their hand and draws that many cards.
<2:> Your opponent draws a card.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Bullseye has made a career out of hitting banks.

Card.AbilityTextEng: <10:> This attack hits you for <10>.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Spider-Man didn't mean to bring his work home with him.

Card.AbilityTextEng: This card is attack +<3> if the top card of your opponent's discard pile is level [1].
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Mmm. Spider-Snacks! My favorite!"
It's always more fun to win as a team!

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> Destroy an opponent's Keeper of level [6] or less.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "I'm going to hit you now. Whoops. Already did."

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> Draw a card.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Villains take as many as they want." —Lizard

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} When you do at least 4 damage with a [SinisterSyndicate] attack, heal 3 and destroy this Keeper.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Nothing like a day at the Sinister Spa.

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> You may return a Keeper to its owner's hand.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "That wasss totally worth the wait!" —Lizardling

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} When you do at least 4 damage with a [SinisterSyndicate] attack, this Keeper hits for <8> and is destroyed.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Green and purple are Spider-Man's least favorite colors.

Card.AbilityTextEng: Reveal any number of cards from your hand. This card is attack +<1> for each different Factor you revealed.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Green Goblin's toybox isn’t like anyone else's.

Card.AbilityTextEng: This card is attack +<4> if the top card of your discard pile is [SinisterSyndicate].
Card.FlavorTextEng: "You know, I'm feeling much better. Really. Can I go now?" —Scarlet Spider

Card.AbilityTextEng: This card is attack +<4> if the top card of your discard pile is Dr. Octopus, Dr. Doom, or Dr. Strange.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Covert Operations" sounded more sinister on the phone.

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} Whenever you do at least 2 damage with a [SinisterSyndicate] attack, this Keeper hits your opponent for <2>, then hits you for <2>.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Chompity chomp chompersss!"

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> The power becomes [4].
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Guess who?" —Mysterio

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} At the start of your turn, if you have another [SinisterSyndicate] Keeper in play, this Keeper hits for <2>.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Venom, what happened to my rabbit?"

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> Destroy an opponent's Keeper that's not [Speed].
Card.FlavorTextEng: Finally, a fight HYDRA agents can win!
Card.ArtistName: Kelly Goodine, Matt Hall & Mike Withem

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} Your power is +[2] for [Brotherhood] cards.
Card.FlavorTextEng: If you're not a mutant, you're not getting in.

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} Assault <1> (At the start of your turn, this Keeper hits for 1.)
Card.FlavorTextEng: When you care enough to steal the very best.
Card.Rules: keeper = 'true' trigger = 2 def OnBeginTurn(z): game.PushDamage(me.opponent, card, 1, False, False)
Card.Affinity: #DAL #(30) ST076 #This card is +1 Power for Strength and Tech cards.

Card.FlavorTextEng: No immovable object is going to stop this force.

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> Your power is +[3] this turn. You may play a [Brotherhood] card.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Sabretooth likes to mark both his territory and his enemies.
Card.Rules: trigger = 2 def OnTriggered(a): game.AdjustPowerBonus(me, 3) game.PushPlayCard(me, game.LegalHand(me).FilterByTeam('B'))

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> You may play a [Brotherhood] card at attack +<1>.
Card.FlavorTextEng: This is one meal you won't forget.
Card.Rules: trigger = 2 def OnTriggered(a): atk = game.PushPlayCard(me, game.LegalHand(me).FilterByTeam('B')) atk.attackBonus = 1

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> Reveal the top card of your opponent's deck. If it's a playable [X-Men] card, play it.
Card.FlavorTextEng: She always gets a second chance to make a first impression.

Card.AbilityTextEng: This attack can't be blocked from the hand.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Knocking down superheroes is right up Juggie's alley.
Card.Rules: def OnAttack(a): a.unhandblockable = True

Card.AbilityTextEng: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's [Animal] or [Energy], this card is attack +<3>.
Card.FlavorTextEng: When he uses all the powers of the Fantastic Four at once, he is Unstoppa-Skrull!

Card.AbilityTextEng: <3:> Look at your opponent's hand. Discard a card from that hand. Then your opponent discards all copies of that card from their deck. Shuffle that deck.
Card.FlavorTextEng: There's only one thing on their shopping list.

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> Destroy an opponent's Keeper of level [5] or less.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Look what the cat dragged in.

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} Your opponent’s power is - [4].
Card.FlavorTextEng: Who knew being a super hero could be so disgusting?
Card.Rules: keeper = 'true' trigger = 2 def GetOpponentPowerBonus(c,r): r.num = -4

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> Each of your opponent's Keepers hits your opponent for <3> and is destroyed.

{2: Keeper} Your opponent's cards are attack - <5>.
At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this Keeper.
Card.FlavorTextEng: CLAAAAAANNNNNG!

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} As long as your power is [4] or less, your cards are attack +<2>.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Who says Spider-Girl can't fly?

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> Destroy an opponent's Keeper of level [7] or less. If you do, you may play a Jean Grey, Phoenix, or Emma Frost card.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Now that my visor is calibrated..." —Cyclops

Card.AbilityTextEng: <3:> Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put an [X-Men] card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in random order.
<2:> Destroy an opponent's Keeper, chosen at random.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "I hope everyone's Abomination insurance is paid up." —Iron Man
Card.Rules: import random trigger = 2 def OnTriggered(a): count = me.opponent.keepers.size() if count > 0: c = me.opponent.keepers.get(random.randint(0, count-1)) game.DestroyKeeper(me.opponent, c)

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} When you block an opponent's attack from your hand, this Keeper hits for <3> and is destroyed.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Spiders for lunch, my minionsssss." - Lizard
Card.Rules: keeper = 'true' trigger = 2 def OnBlock(d): game.PushDestroyKeeper(me, card) game.PushDamage(me.opponent, card, 3, False, False)

Card.AbilityTextEng: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's level [7] or more, this card is attack +<5>
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Asteroid M will make Asteroids A through L look like a pile of rocks!" —Magneto

Card.AbilityTextEng: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's [Strength] or Wasp, this card is attack +<3>.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Pym particles cause matter to expand or shrink. Mr. Fuzzywinkle is enjoying "expand."
Card.Affinity: 70:heroWasp 70:factorS #DAL It would be better to combine the top 2 lines in OR clause, since these first 2 lines shouldn't stack, although there are many other cards where two overlapping do intentionally stack. -15!

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> Choose an opponent's [FantasticFour] Keeper. That Keeper hits your opponent for <4> and is destroyed.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Time to activate my hidden Clone-bot!" —Dr. Doom

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> Shuffle your opponent's hand and all their Keepers into their deck.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Look into my eyes — helmet! I mean helmet!"

Card.AbilityTextEng: This card is attack +<3> if you reveal a Falcon or Nick Fury card from your hand.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Cap's greatest weapons are his friends.

Card.AbilityTextEng: <3:> Swap your opponent's discard pile and deck. Shuffle each of them.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "My new Ock-Monkey will turn this world upside-down!" —Dr. Octopus

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} When you do at least 4 damage with a [SinisterSyndicate] attack, this Keeper hits for <4> and is destroyed.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Lizardlings will do anything to surprise someone.

Card.AbilityTextEng: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it has two characters, this card is attack +<5>.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "For Crushbot attack, press 6. For Moloid infestation, press 7. For Mindless Ones..."

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} At the start of your turn, destroy a Keeper. Whenever another Keeper is destroyed, this keeper hits for <2>.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Has anyone seen the delivery guy?

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} Assault <5> (At the start of your turn, this Keeper hits for 5.)
Card.FlavorTextEng: Steel yourself for some heavy rain.
Card.Rules: keeper = 'true' trigger = 2 def OnBeginTurn(z): game.PushDamage(me.opponent, card, 5, False, False)

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> Destroy an opponent's Keeper of level [3] or less.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Let me send you the bills!" —Hand Ninja
Juggernaut likes breaking sprees more than shopping sprees.
Don't drink this... unless you WANT to be a powerful maniac.

Card.AbilityTextEng: This card is attack +<4> if the top card of your opponent's discard pile is attack <2> or less.
Card.FlavorTextEng: It was a scary morning for Pookie, Meow-Meow, and Mr. Pumpkinpants.
War Machine is his own reinforcements.

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} Whenever your opponent attacks you, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on the top or bottom of your deck.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Doom demands your threes!" —Dr. Doom

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} Your Lizard, Lizardling, Abomination, and Reptil cards are attack +<1>.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Why aren't you lissstening to me?!"

Card.AbilityTextEng: This attack can't be blocked from the deck.
Card.FlavorTextEng: The Juggernaut won't let a little thing like a ten-story building stand in his way.
Card.Rules: def OnAttack(a): a.undeckblockable = True

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> If the top card of your opponent's discard pile is playable, play it.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Recognize my friends?" —Super Skrull

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} Whenever your opponent does at least 4 damage with an [Avengers] attack, this Keeper hits for <2>.
Card.FlavorTextEng: While the heroes are away, the Moloids will play.

Card.AbilityTextEng: <3:> Return this attack to your hand.
Card.FlavorTextEng: HYDRA: Many heads, but not a brain to be found.

Card.AbilityTextEng: This card is attack -<1> for each damage you took last turn.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Sabretooth: More pounce to the ounce.
Card.Rules: def OnAttack(a): a.attackBonus -= game.GetLastTurnDamage()

Card.FlavorTextEng: Abomination thinks that if confidence is good, overconfidence must be better.
Card.Rules: keeper = 'true' trigger = 2 def OnOpponentAttackModify(a): a.attackBonus += 2

Card.AbilityTextEng: When your opponent blocks this attack from their hand, this attack hits you for <2>.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "What company did you say you work for?" —Storm

Card.AbilityTextEng: Look at your opponent's hand. This card is attack +<1> for each different character in your opponent's hand.
Card.FlavorTextEng: It's not science until something blows up.

Card.AbilityTextEng: <5:> You may play a [Brotherhood] card at attack +<2>.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "One Screwball Special comin' up!" —Juggernaut
Card.Rules: trigger = 5 def OnTriggered(a): atk = game.PushPlayCard(me, game.LegalHand(me).FilterByTeam('B')) atk.attackBonus = 2

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} At the start of your turn, if there are exactly two Keepers in play, this keeper hits for <2>.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Bullseye and Emma Frost: an unlikely pair.

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> You may play a [Brotherhood] card.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Let me slip into something a little more deadly." —Mystique

Card.AbilityTextEng: If this attack is not blocked on the first hit, the rest of the attack is unblockable.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Cuts in the HYDRA disguise budget had unforeseen consequences.
Card.Rules: def OnAttack(a): a.unblockableAfterDamage = 1

Card.AbilityTextEng: <2:> Put the top card of your discard pile into your hand.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Anything you can do, he can do better!

Card.AbilityTextEng: This card is attack +<4> if the top card of your discard pile is [Elemental] or [Tech].
Card.FlavorTextEng: "The Hand is everywhere — like right behind you!" —Hand Ninja

Card.AbilityTextEng: Counterstrike (When you block with this card from your hand, it hits for <1>.)
Card.FlavorTextEng: The fish aren't happy about this either.
Card.Rules: def OnBlockWith(d): game.PushDamage(me.opponent, card, 1, False, False)

Card.AbilityTextEng: Choose a Factor. This attack can’t be blocked by cards of that Factor.
Card.FlavorTextEng: A quack to the back of the head.

Card.AbilityTextEng: Choose a number. If this attack does exactly that much damage, return this attack to your hand.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Let's make it interesting."

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} When your opponent has no cards left in their deck, they discard their hand.
Card.FlavorTextEng: "Now you've got nowhere left to run!"

Card.AbilityTextEng: {2: Keeper} Whenever one of your cards does any amount of damage to you, heal 1.
Card.FlavorTextEng: Even a cold-blooded villain needs a hot bath now and then.
Card.Rules: #PreventKO #Above comment prevents KO because it could save your life. keeper = 'true' trigger = 2 def OnTakeDamage(d): if d.weapon.getOwner() == me: game.PushHeal(me, 1)
